mapper.select: SELECT ot.o_no, ps.p_no,ps.p_code,pt.p_name, ps.p_size, os.o_count, os.o_sub_price, os.o_sub_total_price FROM order_tb ot JOIN order_sub os ON ot.o_no=os.o_no JOIN product_sub ps ON os.p_no=ps.p_no JOIN product_tb pt ON ps.p_code = pt.p_code WHERE ot.mem_num=#{mem_num} and ot.o_status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE order_tb SET o_total_price =(SELECT sum(o_sub_total_price) FROM order_sub WHERE o_no=#{o_no})+3000, o_total_count = (SELECT count(o_count) FROM order_sub WHERE o_no= #{o_no}), o_date=sysdate, o_status='2' WHERE o_no=#{o_no} and mem_num=#{mem_num} AND o_status='1'
